title: For Whom the Bell Tolls
description:
Spark Publishing’s Literature Guides are celebrating their 5th Anniversary!  To celebrate this, we’re giving our TOP 50 a revamp by adding some exciting new features.There will be sixteen pages devoted to writing a literary essay including: 
   Glossary of literary terms,  
   Step by step tutoring on how to write a literary essay  
   Feature on how not to plagiarized. 
 Each book will also include an A+ Essay; an actual literary essay written about the Spark-ed book, to show students how an essay should be written.
author: SparkNotes
